sentences.en: And it can be frustrating to watch a beloved pet scratch incessantly—especially after you’ve tried everything to get rid of the pests.
sentences.cn: 看着自己心爱的宠物不停地挠啊挠相当令人烦躁——尤其是在你费尽心思除去那些害虫的时候。

sentences.en: Boats cross incessantly and cost only a few cents per ride.
sentences.cn: 渡船不断地渡到对岸去,每坐一次只化几角钱.

sentences.en: He would talk incessantly if you give him a litle encouragement.
sentences.cn: 你只要稍微鼓动他一下,他就会滔滔不绝地说.

sentences.en: It 's fine to make conversation and inquire into your friend's well-being — but don't ask incessantly.
sentences.cn: 你可以和朋友交流，关心以下她的近况，但别总是不停地询问。 㐺。

sentences.en: It is true he was rarely heard to speak, but smoked his pipe incessantly.
sentences.cn: 真的,大家难得听见他讲话, 他只是不停地抽烟斗.

sentences.en: It rained incessantly for the whole two weeks.
sentences.cn: 雨不间断地下了整整两个星期.

sentences.en: People shouted, while the drums and. cymbals crashed incessantly.
sentences.cn: 人声嘈杂, 锣鼓不停地大响特响.

sentences.en: She always can look for the point what makes to be busy incessantly of oneself.
sentences.cn: 她总是能找点什么事使自己忙个不停.

sentences.en: Such the underlying bed the competition, another incessantly the cabinet profession.
sentences.cn: 这样的“低层”竞争, 在橱柜行业层出不穷.

sentences.en: The checkered pattern of that suspender recurred incessantly to his mind.
sentences.cn: 那根背带的棋盘格花纹不停地在他脑子里显现出来.

sentences.en: The detective rarely spoke during the session but smoked his pipe incessantly.
sentences.cn: 开会的时候，侦探很少开口，只是不停地抽烟斗。

sentences.en: The machines roar incessantly during the hours of daylight.
sentences.cn: 机器在白天隆隆地响个不停.

sentences.en: The married couple argued incessantly and finally decided to separate because they are incompatible.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妻不断争吵,由于实在无法相容,最后他们决定分手.

sentences.en: The rain beat incessantly on the roof tiles and windows.
sentences.cn: 雨点敲着瓦,敲着窗,响个不停.

sentences.en: These verbs are compared as they mean to trouble persistently or incessantly.
sentences.cn: 比较这些动词,它们都意为不断地或频繁地打扰.

trans.tran_cn: 不断地，不停地，接连不断，连绵不断，不已
